ingredients.content: 350 g leeks (white part only), cut in pieces
1 tsp salt, plus extra to taste
250 g potatoes, peeled, cut in pieces

preparations.content: Place leeks and salt in mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add olive oil and butter and sauté <b>12 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add 600 g water, vegetable stock cube and white pepper and cook <b>20 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add nutmeg, milk and remaining 100 g water and blend <b>1 min/speed 5<b>-10, increasing speed gradually.<b> Adjust seasoning to taste and serve hot, sprinkled with chopped fresh chives.
